answers.answer: It's carpel tunnel you can get braces to wear at night but it will go away after baby comes. It's due to fluid retention.

question: I have gestational diabetes. And just recently I haven't been able to feel my fingers, hands, or arms. The night seems to be worse but Its bad during the day as well. Not sure if it's normal. I go to the dr this week but just wanted to see if anyone else has this issue? TIA
title: numbness in hands and arms
